COMPONENTS.author: adidenko
COMPONENTS.description: Don't forget to update rules, fields sql, update id package and enable rules.
COMPONENTS.name: dev-apps.onevizion.com_task_definition_configuration.xml

T_LABEL.LABEL_TEXT: Ordre De Tri De La Le Nombre

T_CONFIG_FIELD.SQL_QUERY: select wp_task_id, order_number||' '||task_name "Task Name" from wp_workplan wp join wp_tasks wt on (wp.wp_workplan_id = wt.wp_workplan_id) where wp.active = 0 and wp.name = util.getValStr(:pk, 'TDF_WORKPLAN_NAME') and workplan_type = 0

T_LABEL.LABEL_TEXT: 위의 입력을 기반으로 작업 플란 작업
PLAN DE TRAVAIL ACTION DE TÂCHE
<b> action de travail de plan de travail </ b>
PLAN DE TRABAJO ACCIÓN DE TAREA
WP Instanciation et mises à jour
CIBLE PLAN DE TRAVAIL ET DE LA TÂCHE
<b> Plan de travail cible et tâche </ B>
OBJETIVO PLAN DE TRABAJO Y TAREA
DÉCLENCHEUR NOM DU CHAMP ET LA VALEUR DE DÉCLENCHEMENT
<B> Nom du champ de déclenchement et valeur de déclenchement </ b>
NOMBRE DE CAMPO DE ACTIVACIÓN Y VALOR DE DESENCADENADOR
PLAN DE TRAVAIL DÉFINITION DE TÂCHE
<B> Définition des tâches de plan de travail </ b>
PLAN DE TRABAJO DEFINICIÓN DE TAREA
If changes apply to All Programs and Project Types, then leave these fields blank
If changes apply to All Programs and Project Types, then leave these fields blank
If changes apply to All Programs and Project Types, then leave these fields blank
If changes apply to All Programs and Project Types, then leave these fields blank
Si des modifications s'appliquent à Tous les Programmes et les Types de Projet, puis laisser ces champs vides
Si des modifications s'appliquent à tous les programmes et types de projets; Ensuite, laissez ces champs vides
Si los cambios se aplican a Todos los programas y tipos de proyectos, entonces deja estos campos en blanco
Modify Workplan Task attributes based on field values
작업플랜,작업 이름,필드 이름 및 값을 기준으로 작업플랜 입력
Modifier le Plan de travail de la Tâche attributs basés sur les valeurs de champ
Modifier les attributs de tâches de plan de travail basé sur les valeurs de champ
Modificar Atributos de tarea del plan de trabajo basados en valores de campo
Inclure dans le Plan de travail d'une Tâche
Inclure dans la tâche de plan de travail due
Incluir en Plan de Trabajo Tarea Vencida

RULE_TYPE.TEMPLATE_SQL: select wp_workplan_id as "Template Workplan ID", name as "Template Workplan Name", wp_workplan_id as "Template Workplan Id" from wp_workplan where workplan_type = 0

T_LABEL.LABEL_TEXT: Executed when a new WorkPlan is assigned to a Trackor.
Executed when a new WorkPlan is assigned to a Trackor.
Executed when a new WorkPlan is assigned to a Trackor.
새 작업 플랜이 트랙터에 할당될 때 실행됩니다.
Exécuté lorsque l'utilisateur est mis à jour.
Exécuté lorsqu'un nouveau plan de travail est attribué à un suivi.
Ejecutado cuando se asigna un nuevo WorkPlan a un Trackor.

T_BPD_ITEM.DESCRIPTION: You must assign the workplan first. Click Save. Then set a Workplan Start date. Otherwise the Date Calculations will not save with the Task Definition parameters.
T_BPD_ITEM.NAME: TDF - workplan task duration

RULE_TYPE.TEMPLATE_SQL: select xitor_type_id as "Xitor Type ID", xitor_type as "Xitor Type", xitor_type_id as "Xitor Type Id" from xitor_type

T_LABEL.LABEL_TEXT: Attention! L'ID de l'Étiquette est réservé pour le Type de Règle. L'utiliser uniquement pour le Type de Règle de l'étiquette ou de la description
Executed After the Trackor is created or updated.
Executed After the Trackor is created or updated.
Executed After the Trackor is created or updated.
트랙터를 만들거나 업데이트 한 후 실행.
Trackor Créé Ou Mis À Jour (Après)
Exécuté après la création ou la mise à jour du suivi.
Ejecutado Después de crear o actualizar el Trackor.

T_BPD_ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Rule to recalc task dates values based on TDF_PROPAGATION_OPTIONS field value
T_BPD_ITEM.NAME: TDF_PROPAGATION_OPTIONS tc/tu

RULES_ITEM.RULE: Trigger Fields updated recalculate Task Definition

RULE_TYPE.TEMPLATE_SQL: select c.config_field_id as "Config Field ID", c.config_field_name as "Config Field Name", x.xitor_type as "Xitor Type", lbl_pref.label_text || lbl_cf.label_text as "Field Label", c.config_field_id as "Config Field Id", dt.type_name as "Data Type" from config_field c join xitor_type x on x.xitor_type_id = c.xitor_type_id join config_field_data_type dt on dt.config_field_data_type_id = c.data_type left join vw_label lbl_cf on c.app_label_id = lbl_cf.label_id and lbl_cf.app_lang_id = :p_lang_id left join vw_label lbl_pref on x.prefix_label_id = lbl_pref.label_id and lbl_pref.app_lang_id = :p_lang_id where c.is_static = 0 or c.config_field_name in ('XITOR_KEY','XITOR_CLASS_ID')

T_LABEL.LABEL_TEXT: Executed when a Field's value is changed.
Executed when a Field's value is changed.
Executed when a Field's value is changed.
Executed when a Field's value is changed.
Les règles de ce type sera exécuté à minuit.
Exécuté lorsque la valeur d'un champ est modifiée.
Ejecutado cuando se cambia el valor de un Campo.

T_BPD_ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Rule for recalculating task values based on Task Definition fields updates
T_BPD_ITEM.NAME: Trigger Fields updated recalculate Task Definition

RULE_TYPE.TEMPLATE_SQL: select c.config_field_id as "Config Field ID", c.config_field_name as "Config Field Name", x.xitor_type as "Xitor Type", lbl_pref.label_text || lbl_cf.label_text as "Field Label", c.config_field_id as "Config Field Id", dt.type_name as "Data Type" from config_field c join xitor_type x on x.xitor_type_id = c.xitor_type_id join config_field_data_type dt on dt.config_field_data_type_id = c.data_type left join vw_label lbl_cf on c.app_label_id = lbl_cf.label_id and lbl_cf.app_lang_id = :p_lang_id left join vw_label lbl_pref on x.prefix_label_id = lbl_pref.label_id and lbl_pref.app_lang_id = :p_lang_id where c.is_static = 0 or c.config_field_name in ('XITOR_KEY','XITOR_CLASS_ID')

T_LABEL.LABEL_TEXT: Executed when a Field's value is changed.
Executed when a Field's value is changed.
Executed when a Field's value is changed.
Executed when a Field's value is changed.
Les règles de ce type sera exécuté à minuit.
Exécuté lorsque la valeur d'un champ est modifiée.
Ejecutado cuando se cambia el valor de un Campo.

T_BPD_ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Rule to control rule's "Trigger Fields updated recalculate Task Definition" id_nums
T_BPD_ITEM.NAME: Task Definition update id_nums

RULE_TYPE.TEMPLATE_SQL: select c.config_field_id as "Config Field ID", c.config_field_name as "Config Field Name", x.xitor_type as "Xitor Type", lbl_pref.label_text || lbl_cf.label_text as "Field Label", c.config_field_id as "Config Field Id", dt.type_name as "Data Type" from config_field c join xitor_type x on x.xitor_type_id = c.xitor_type_id join config_field_data_type dt on dt.config_field_data_type_id = c.data_type left join vw_label lbl_cf on c.app_label_id = lbl_cf.label_id and lbl_cf.app_lang_id = :p_lang_id left join vw_label lbl_pref on x.prefix_label_id = lbl_pref.label_id and lbl_pref.app_lang_id = :p_lang_id where c.is_static = 0 or c.config_field_name in ('XITOR_KEY','XITOR_CLASS_ID')

T_LABEL.LABEL_TEXT: Executed when a Field's value is changed.
Executed when a Field's value is changed.
Executed when a Field's value is changed.
Executed when a Field's value is changed.

RULE_TYPE.TEMPLATE_SQL: select xitor_type_id as "Trackor Type ID", xitor_type as "Trackor Type", xitor_type_id as "Trackor Type Id" from xitor_type where is_static_definition <> 1

T_LABEL.LABEL_TEXT: La Tâche De Mise À Jour (Après)

Executed when selected from the Trackor Browser or Task View pages. This is used to select a rule that can be written to perform any special function (e.g., delete Trackors, lock or unlock fields, mass assign values, etc.).

Executed when selected from the Trackor Browser or Task View pages. This is used to select a rule that can be written to perform any special function (e.g., delete Trackors, lock or unlock fields, mass assign values, etc.).

Executed when selected from the Trackor Browser or Task View pages. This is used to select a rule that can be written to perform any special function (e.g., delete Trackors, lock or unlock fields, mass assign values, etc.).
트랙터 브라우저 또는 작업 보기 페이지에서 선택할 때 실행됨. 이 사용 규칙을 선택할 수 있는 기록을 수행할 어떤 특별한 기능(예를들면,삭제 Trackors,잠금 또는 잠금 해제 분야,질량 값을 지정,등등.).
Exécutée lorsqu'une valeur est mise à jour.

Exécuté lorsqu'il est sélectionné dans le navigateur Trackor ou les pages de la vue Tâche. Ceci est utilisé pour sélectionner une règle pouvant être écrite pour effectuer toute fonction spéciale (E.g.; Supprimer les suiveurs; champs de verrouillage ou de déverrouillage; masse Attribuer des valeurs; etc.).

Ejecutado cuando se selecciona de las páginas Navegador Trackor o Vista de tareas. Esto se utiliza para seleccionar una regla que se puede escribir para realizar cualquier función especial (por ejemplo, eliminar Trackors, bloquear o desbloquear campos, asignar valores masivos, etc.).
